full of migrants an official instructs

Italy this man says this weekend's Italy
has coordinated more than 16 ships in
its rescue effort including a French

around a thousand migrants died in two
big shipwrecks human rights groups
called on the European Union to
reinstate the search and rescue mission
it's scaled down in November the U has
responded by tripling the funding of its
current border force Italy has to find a

got to find a lasting way of dealing
with a problem which may only get worse
in the next few months many thousands of
